Yandex Disk.name: P02a.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose  that it directly notifies users about all changes to its privacy policies?

Yandex Disk.name: P02a.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose how it will directly notify users of changes?

Yandex Disk.name: P02a.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose the timeframe within which it directly notifies users of changes prior to these changes coming into effect?

Yandex Disk.name: P02a.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company maintain a public archive or change log?

Yandex Disk.name: P02a.05
Yandex Disk.description: (For mobile ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it requires apps sold through its app store to notify users when the app changes its privacy policy?

Yandex Disk.name: P02a.06
Yandex Disk.description: (For personal digital assistant ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it requires skills sold through its skill store to notify users when the skill changes its privacy policy?
